QuestData.Title: The Guo-Lai Halls
QuestData.Description: The mogu are up to something, I can feel it.$B$BThey've been sending scouts down into the Guo-Lai Halls.$B$BAccording to the caretakers, the Halls are home to ancient treasures of emperors past. Not only riches, but artifacts of great power.$B$BWe must prevent the mogu from accessing these treasures! Go down the ramp to the northwest and stop them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the mogu presence in the Guo-Lai Halls.
